subject: Pro X and Plus X compatibility
description_text:
Hi,

I just received my Pro X clutch. I have previously purchased the Plus X
Brake and Throttle, and was unaware that the Pro X pedals used a RJ45
connector rather than the RJ11 that is used for the Plus X pedals and the
Plus X control box. I would rather not return the item and get the Plus X
clutch if possible. Is there any way  to modify the pedals in any way to
use a RJ11 connector and be compatible with the Plus X control box?

Regards,

Taaj

conversations.body_text: Hi Taaj Street,     Let’s wait a few days. I’ll purchase several RJ45 female connectors and crimp an RJ11 plug to send to you. It will work, but the lighting won’t be functional.

Awesome, thank you much appreciated

On Thu, Dec 11, 2025 at 4:25 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Taaj Street,  The adapter is ready. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and I will ship it to you tomorrow (Monday).

Great, thank you!!

Order Number: 8207355820179714
Phone number: +61 424 046 052
Contact Name: Taaj Street
Address: Unit 1/3 Edna Street, Mount Waverly 3149
Hi Taaj Street,      Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2535100705663258. You can track it at this website:https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2535100705663258
